snippet: Omar Infante hit a three-run homer in the sixth inning and had a run-scoring single in the fifth as the visiting Kansas City Royals beat the Detroit Tigers, 11-8, on Monday night.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Kansas City Royals beat Detroit Tigers, 11-8; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Omar Infante hit a three-run homer in the sixth inning and had a run-scoring single in the fifth as the visiting Kansas City Royals beat the Detroit Tigers, 11-8, on Monday night.

headline.main: Kansas City Creeps Up on Detroit
headline.print_headline: Kansas City Creeps Up on Detroit
